question: Which of the following defines the term computer maintainence properly?
option1: It means changing your system frequently.
option2: It means changing parts of system regularly.
option3: It is the practice of keeping computers in a good state of repair.
option4: It means changing system fan regularly.
answer: It is the practice of keeping computers in a good state of repair.
explanation: Computer maintenance is the practice of keeping computers in a good state of repair. A computer containing accumulated dust and debris may not run properly.
